name: Majordomo2 _list_file_get() Directory Traversal
author: Nikolas Sotiriu
description:
This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability present in
        the _list_file_get() function of Majordomo2 (help function). By default, this
        module will attempt to download the Majordomo config.pl file.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: RPORT
options.description: The target port

options.name: VHOST
options.description: HTTP server virtual host

options.name: SSL
options.description: Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: UserAgent
options.description: The User-Agent header to use for all requests

options.name: HttpUsername
options.description: The HTTP username to specify for authentication

options.name: HttpPassword
options.description: The HTTP password to specify for authentication

options.name: HttpRawHeaders
options.description: Path to ERB-templatized raw headers to append to existing headers

options.name: DigestAuthIIS
options.description: Conform to IIS, should work for most servers. Only set to false for non-IIS servers

options.name: SSLVersion
options.description: Specify the version of SSL/TLS to be used (Auto, TLS and SSL23 are auto-negotiate) (Accepted: Auto, TLS, SSL23, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2)

options.name: FingerprintCheck
options.description: Conduct a pre-exploit fingerprint verification

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to use for Windows authentication

options.name: HttpClientTimeout
options.description: HTTP connection and receive timeout

options.name: HttpPartialResponses
options.description: Return partial HTTP responses despite timeouts

options.name: HttpTrace
options.description: Show the raw HTTP requests and responses

options.name: HttpTraceHeadersOnly
options.description: Show HTTP headers only in HttpTrace

options.name: HttpTraceColors
options.description: HTTP request and response colors for HttpTrace (unset to disable)

options.name: HTTP::uri_encode_mode
options.description: Enable URI encoding (Accepted: none, hex-normal, hex-noslashes, hex-random, hex-all, u-normal, u-all, u-random)

options.name: HTTP::uri_full_url
options.description: Use the full URL for all HTTP requests

options.name: HTTP::pad_method_uri_count
options.description: How many whitespace characters to use between the method and uri

options.name: HTTP::pad_uri_version_count
options.description: How many whitespace characters to use between the uri and version

options.name: HTTP::pad_method_uri_type
options.description: What type of whitespace to use between the method and uri (Accepted: space, tab, apache)

options.name: HTTP::pad_uri_version_type
options.description: What type of whitespace to use between the uri and version (Accepted: space, tab, apache)

options.name: HTTP::method_random_valid
options.description: Use a random, but valid, HTTP method for request

options.name: HTTP::method_random_invalid
options.description: Use a random invalid, HTTP method for request

options.name: HTTP::method_random_case
options.description: Use random casing for the HTTP method

options.name: HTTP::version_random_valid
options.description: Use a random, but valid, HTTP version for request

options.name: HTTP::version_random_invalid
options.description: Use a random invalid, HTTP version for request

options.name: HTTP::uri_dir_self_reference
options.description: Insert self-referential directories into the uri

options.name: HTTP::uri_dir_fake_relative
options.description: Insert fake relative directories into the uri

options.name: HTTP::uri_use_backslashes
options.description: Use back slashes instead of forward slashes in the uri

options.name: HTTP::pad_fake_headers
options.description: Insert random, fake headers into the HTTP request

options.name: HTTP::pad_fake_headers_count
options.description: How many fake headers to insert into the HTTP request

options.name: HTTP::pad_get_params
options.description: Insert random, fake query string variables into the request

options.name: HTTP::pad_get_params_count
options.description: How many fake query string variables to insert into the request

options.name: HTTP::pad_post_params
options.description: Insert random, fake post variables into the request

options.name: HTTP::pad_post_params_count
options.description: How many fake post variables to insert into the request

options.name: HTTP::uri_fake_end
options.description: Add a fake end of URI (eg: /%20HTTP/1.0/../../)

options.name: HTTP::uri_fake_params_start
options.description: Add a fake start of params to the URI (eg: /%3fa=b/../)

options.name: HTTP::header_folding
options.description: Enable folding of HTTP headers

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: FILE
options.description: Define the remote file to view, ex:/etc/passwd

options.name: URI
options.description: Majordomo vulnerable URI path

options.name: DEPTH
options.description: Define the max traversal depth
